name: knowuniverse
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: know universe
des:
Ask for Universe Facts, and learn about black holes, planets constellations, galaxies and lot more.
Universe Facts provides fun the whole family can enjoy and is guaranteed to make you smarter.

To start, just say "Alexa, launch our amazing universe " or "Alexa, open our amazing universe" to get a fact".

At anytime, you can stop by saying "Alexa, stop"
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
